panels.description: Avg. of all DBs over the whole selected period

targets.query: select mean(tx) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"), 1s) as tx FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none))

panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Queries Per Second based on pg_stat_statements.calls

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Requries pg_stat_statements extension and an function from  "sql/metric_fetching_helpers" folder

targets.query: select mean(runtime) from (select non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as runtime from "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter AND calls > 1000 GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none))

panels.title: Query runtime

panels.description: Sum of all DB changes over the whole selected period

targets.query: select sum(diff) from (SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") as diff FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(3650d) fill(none))

panels.title: Total DB size ch.

panels.description: Sum of all DB changes over the whole selected period

targets.query: select sum(bloat) from (SELECT last("approx_free_space_b") - first("approx_free_space_b") as bloat FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(3650d) fill(none))

panels.title: Total bloat ch. (approx.)

panels.description: Avg. over the whole selected period

targets.query: SELECT mean("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3650d) fill(none)

panels.title: CPU Load

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("blk_read_time"), 1h)  + non_negative_derivative(mean("blk_write_time"), 1h) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)

SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("temp_bytes"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT mean("idleintransaction") + mean("waiting") + mean("active")  FROM "backends" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(10m) fill(none)

panels.description: Requires according "metric fetching helpers" on the monitored server

targets.query: SELECT mean("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)

panels.title: CPU load

panels.description: Requires according "metric fetching helpers" on the monitored server

targets.query: select non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) from "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter AND calls > 1000 GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)

panels.title: Avg. query runtime

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
select non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) from "stat_statements_calls" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
select non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) from "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(5m) fill(none)
